long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
***This version is for Beta testing***

Productivity tool:
- Estimates reading time and writes a brief summary under the article title. 
- This helps readers quickly gauge relevance and decide whether to continue reading.
